desc.en: Sensei is running errands and is caught in a sudden explosive ambush. Sensei flees the scene, but Wakamo appears on the overpass after a chase.
desc.jp: Sensei is running errands and is caught in a sudden explosive ambush. Sensei flees the scene, but Wakamo appears on the overpass after a chase.
desc.zh_cn: 某天，老师为了处理私事而离开校园，没想到街道四周却接连响起爆炸声，而老师也被不明人士袭击。为了躲避敌人的袭击，老师最终跑到高架公路上，并且和尾随而来的{cf若藻}展开了对话。

desc.en: Sensei is late to a meet-up with Wakamo due to work, and Wakamo becomes confused by the apology. Wakamo declares she'd gladly wait for hours, days, or even months. Sensei becomes nervous.
desc.jp: Sensei is late to a meet-up with Wakamo due to work, and Wakamo becomes confused by the apology. Wakamo declares she'd gladly wait for hours, days, or even months. Sensei becomes nervous.
desc.zh_cn: 因为一时忙昏头，老师不小心忘记了和{cf若藻}的约定。虽然老师事后一直向{cf若藻}道歉，但{cf若藻}反而对老师的举动感到相当不解。{cf若藻}表示只要老师绝对不会背叛自己，无论要她等几个小时、几天、几个月都无所谓，然而听完她的话后，老师的额头却不禁冒了几滴冷汗。

profile.en:
One of the Seven Prisoners that escaped the Corrections Bureau after being suspended from Allied Hyakkiyako Academy.

She is the feared Fox of Calamity due to her destructive ways. Her motives are a mystery, and there are several rumors surrounding the face under her mask. Some say there's a monstrous devil underneath, but it remains only a rumor.
profile.jp:
百鬼夜行連合学院所属、しかし停学処分となった後に矯正局へと入れられ、さらにそこから脱獄した「七囚人」の一人。

無差別かつ大規模な破壊行為により「災厄の狐」と呼ばれ恐れられる少女。動機も目的も一切が謎に包まれている。仮面の下に隠された素顔は鬼のように怖い、悪魔のように醜いなどの噂が絶えないが、知らないものは大抵恐ろしく感じられるものである。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
百鬼夜行联合学院所属，受到停学处分后被关入矫正局，随后从中越狱的「七罪人」之一。

因无差别且大规模的破坏行为而被称为「灾厄之狐」可怕少女。
包括无论动机还是目的在内的一切都是迷。
面具之下掩饰的素颜如鬼魅一般恐怖，如恶魔一般丑陋之类的传闻未曾断绝。
不知道的人大概都会对此感到恐惧吧。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
百鬼夜行学园所属，因为停学处分而被送入矫正局，但从中越狱的「七罪人」之一。

由于无差别且大规模的破坏行为而被称为「灾厄之狐」，令人畏惧的少女。动机及目的也被谜团所包围。隐藏在假面下的素颜有如「恶鬼般恐怖」、「恶魔般丑陋」等的传闻虽然不绝于耳，但人们只是畏惧着未知的事物。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
受到百鬼夜行学院处分后，又从矫正所中逃出来的【七囚人】之一。

因其随心所欲的大规模无差别破坏活动，被冠以【灾厄之狐】之名，成了受人畏惧的对象。她的目的与动机尚不可知，据说面具后隐藏着恶鬼般可怕的真面目，但这也仅仅是个传言罢了。

gacha.jp: ああ……ついに会えましたね、あなた様♡
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 啊啊……终于见到你了，亲爱的♡
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 啊啊……终于见面了呢，阁下♡
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 呵呵……终于和您见面了呢♡

intro.en: Heeheehee. Finally found you. I won't lose you again. Please don't leave my sight. ♥

うふふ……ようやく見つけました。
もう逃がしませんわ、あなた様♥
もう私のお傍から、離れないでくださいね……？

うふふ……ようやく見つけました。

唔呵呵……终于找到了。

请不要再从我身边，离开了哦……？

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Sensei is late to a meet-up with Wakamo due to work, and Wakamo becomes confused by the apology. Wakamo declares she'd gladly wait for hours, days, or even months. Sensei becomes nervous.
desc.jp: Sensei is late to a meet-up with Wakamo due to work, and Wakamo becomes confused by the apology. Wakamo declares she'd gladly wait for hours, days, or even months. Sensei becomes nervous.
desc.zh_cn: 因为一时忙昏头，老师不小心忘记了和{cf若藻}的约定。虽然老师事后一直向{cf若藻}道歉，但{cf若藻}反而对老师的举动感到相当不解。{cf若藻}表示只要老师绝对不会背叛自己，无论要她等几个小时、几天、几个月都无所谓，然而听完她的话后，老师的额头却不禁冒了几滴冷汗。

desc.en: Wakamo suddenly attacks during Sensei's patrol. Luckily, Sensei is able to subdue Wakamo with the help of the Valkyrie Police School students and Sena. Sensei and Sena resume their patrol feeling that something is amiss.
desc.jp: Wakamo suddenly attacks during Sensei's patrol. Luckily, Sensei is able to subdue Wakamo with the help of the Valkyrie Police School students and Sena. Sensei and Sena resume their patrol feeling that something is amiss.
desc.zh_cn: 在老师运行巡逻工作的途中，{cf若藻}忽然现身袭击他，幸亏{cf瀬奈}和{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们及时赶到支持，老师才能顺利制服{cf若藻}。风波落幕后，老师一边压抑着心里那股说不上来的怪异感，一边和{cf瀬奈}再次投入巡逻工作当中。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校
ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?

desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: The festival concludes safely. Fubuki and Kirino are frustrated that Wakamo slipped away. Sena says that she's looking forward to patrolling together again. Chihiro stops by to apologize for not being much help before leaving. Wakamo invades Schale just as things are settling down.
desc.jp: The festival concludes safely. Fubuki and Kirino are frustrated that Wakamo slipped away. Sena says that she's looking forward to patrolling together again. Chihiro stops by to apologize for not being much help before leaving. Wakamo invades Schale just as things are settling down.
desc.zh_cn: 就这样，情人节庆典圆满地画下了句点。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}为了{cf若藻}再次逃脱的事气得牙痒痒的同时，{cf瀬奈}告诉老师自己会一直期待和老师一起巡逻的机会再次到来，而赶来找他们的{cf千寻}则为了自己没能帮上忙的事向老师道歉。就在学生们纷纷离开，而众人也以为骚动彻底落幕的时候，{cf若藻}闯入了{et夏莱}。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Wakamo has been causing mayhem while pursuing Sensei, stirring up trouble in multiple places at once by using fakes. But eventually, the real Wakamo comes face-to-face with Mine, who asks Wakamo why she's causing trouble. When Mine understands Wakamo's reasons, she lets Wakamo pass before resuming her 'remediation' of troublemakers.
desc.jp: Wakamo has been causing mayhem while pursuing Sensei, stirring up trouble in multiple places at once by using fakes. But eventually, the real Wakamo comes face-to-face with Mine, who asks Wakamo why she's causing trouble. When Mine understands Wakamo's reasons, she lets Wakamo pass before resuming her 'remediation' of troublemakers.
desc.zh_cn: {cf若藻}派遣冒牌货四处引起骚动，想要伺机对老师下手，但后来遇见了{cf美祢}。{cf美祢}询问{cf若藻}引起骚动的理由，后来因为被说服，于是便让{cf若藻}离开了。接着再次对引起骚动的问题学生进行救援行动。

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.jp: It's Valentine's Day in Kivotos. Sensei goes on patrol with the Valkyrie Police School students to keep the festivities safe. Will they able to get through the day in one piece?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了情人节！{cf桐乃}和{cf吹雪}带着老师一起在如往年般盛大的活动会场巡逻。少女们的恋情，决胜负的一天开始了！

desc.en: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".
desc.jp: Sensei resumes patrolling with Sena, and they run into Chihiro. Fubuki and Kirino are transporting Wakamo to the Corrections Bureau. Wakamo escapes from the transport truck amidst all the talk of Wakamo's terrifying reputation as the "Fox of Calamity".
desc.zh_cn: 继续四处巡逻的老师和{cf瀬奈}，恰巧碰见了前来检查保全设备的{cf千寻}。与此同时，{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}正准备将{cf若藻}移送至矫正局。就在{cf吹雪}和{cf桐乃}热烈讨论被称为「灾厄之狐」的{cf若藻}有多么可怕时，{cf若藻}不费吹灰之力便逃出了囚车。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: The Valkyrie Police School students begin interrogating Wakamo after escorting her to the Corrections Bureau. Unbothered, Wakamo says that she has a plan of her own and breaks out of the Corrections Bureau.
desc.jp: The Valkyrie Police School students begin interrogating Wakamo after escorting her to the Corrections Bureau. Unbothered, Wakamo says that she has a plan of her own and breaks out of the Corrections Bureau.
desc.zh_cn: 顺利将{cf若藻}押送至矫正局后，{sn女武神}警察学园的学生们便开始对{cf若藻}进行审问。没想到，{cf若藻}根本不把{sn女武神}警察学园放在眼里，只告诉她们自己还有要事要办后就擅自逃离了矫正局。

long.jp: ヴァルキューレ警察学校

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Wakamo is once again recaptured. Chihiro demands responsibility for the string of escapes, but Fubuki maintains that things are under control and calls in Yuuka, Hasumi, Suzumi, and Chinatsu. Fubuki takes Wakamo away, insisting things will be fine thanks to their previous history with Wakamo.
desc.jp: Wakamo is once again recaptured. Chihiro demands responsibility for the string of escapes, but Fubuki maintains that things are under control and calls in Yuuka, Hasumi, Suzumi, and Chinatsu. Fubuki takes Wakamo away, insisting things will be fine thanks to their previous history with Wakamo.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管{cf若藻}很快便再度落网，但{cf千寻}在追究责任时，{cf吹雪}说着这次真的没事，并赶忙找来{cf优香}、{cf莲实}、{cf铃美}和{cf千夏}。由于有曾经和{cf若藻}交手过的帮手们协助押送，{cf吹雪}要众人尽管放一百万个心，继续押送{cf若藻}。

desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.jp: Rowdy gunfire and colorful explosions! Wakamo arrives in an acrid cloud of gunpowder! What is Wakamo's true motive for bringing chaos to the Valentine's Day festival?
desc.zh_cn:
伴随着吵杂的枪声、华丽的爆炸声…以及呛鼻的火药味！
恶名昭彰的{cf若藻}现身了！
{cf若藻}在情人节庆典会场中制造混乱的真正目的究竟为何？！

desc.en: Fubuki is confident that Wakamo won't be able to escape this time. It hits her that all of this was Wakamo's trap all along when Wakamo gets picked up on CCTV at the scene of the festival.
desc.jp: Fubuki is confident that Wakamo won't be able to escape this time. It hits her that all of this was Wakamo's trap all along when Wakamo gets picked up on CCTV at the scene of the festival.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然{cf吹雪}自信满满地向{cf若藻}表示自己绝不会再让她逃走，但当{cf吹雪}见到本该待在矫正局的{cf若藻}出现在庆典现场的监视器画面上时，{cf吹雪}才意识到这一切都是{cf若藻}的陷阱。

desc.en: Against all odds, Wakamo manages to clear all obstacles in her way and finally comes face-to-face with Sensei. Sensei braces for an attack, but it turns out that Wakamo's plan all along was to present Sensei with Valentine's Day chocolates.
desc.jp: Against all odds, Wakamo manages to clear all obstacles in her way and finally comes face-to-face with Sensei. Sensei braces for an attack, but it turns out that Wakamo's plan all along was to present Sensei with Valentine's Day chocolates.
desc.zh_cn: {cf若藻}越过了试图阻挠她的无数障碍，并且再次来到了老师的面前。就在老师做好即将被{cf若藻}大卸八块的觉悟时，他才得知{cf若藻}从一开始就只是为了将情人节巧克力拿给他，才会不惜一次又一次接近他。

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.jp: Wakamo arrives as reinforcement for Rabu but is embarrassed by Sensei's presence and runs away. Sensei predicts that with Wakamo's involvement, the future will be bumpy.
desc.zh_cn: 接受良舞的要求作为支持部队的{cf若藻}，因为老师也在而陷入混乱无法战斗，与头盔团一同逃走了。另一方面，{cf白子}因为钓鱼道具在战斗中受到破坏而非常失落。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.en: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1
name.jp: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?

name.en: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1
name.jp: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1

desc.en: Believing Sensei was kidnapped, Wakamo is motivated. She drives out Rabu, who could be a threat to Sensei, and takes over the Helmet Gangsters. She ends up leading the Helmet Gangsters and once again challenges the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: Believing Sensei was kidnapped, Wakamo is motivated. She drives out Rabu, who could be a threat to Sensei, and takes over the Helmet Gangsters. She ends up leading the Helmet Gangsters and once again challenges the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 知道老师也在这个渡假胜地的{cf若藻}，误以为老师被坏人给抓走，便和良舞与头盔团一起发起进攻。{cf绫音}虽然试图和平解决，{cf若藻}却不由分说地发动了总攻击。

desc.en: Wakamo finally reveals herself after stalking Sensei for a while and gives them some chocolate. Sensei hesitates to accept the chocolate as Wakamo looks on with wide, anticipatory eyes.
desc.jp: Wakamo finally reveals herself after stalking Sensei for a while and gives them some chocolate. Sensei hesitates to accept the chocolate as Wakamo looks on with wide, anticipatory eyes.
desc.zh_cn: 一直偷偷跟踪老师的{cf若藻}最终还是现身在老师面前，鼓起勇气把准备的巧克力送给老师。虽然{cf若藻}的巧克力让老师感到有些害怕，但{cf若藻}充满期待的眼神却从来没从老师身上移开过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
